actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA and SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to terminate on June 1, 1981, the pilot program for small business set-asides under section 8(a).

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to prohibit the Small Business Administration from entering government procurement contracts set aside for small business concerns under such Act after May 31, 1981 (currently the small business set-aside program ends on September 30, 1981).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to terminate on June 1, 1981, the pilot program for small business set-asides under section 8(a).
